mapgen 0.2.0

    Reference

    All functions

    LDblock_view_summary()

    LD block view summary table

    annotator()

    Assign SNPs with annotations based on overlap

    annotator_merged()

    Annotations for causal SNPs (apply these after fine-mapping!)

    assign_locus_snp()

    Assigns each SNP to one ld-block

    clean_sumstats()

    Clean summary statistics

    compile_structure_plot_data()

    Compile input data for making structure plot

    compute_gene_pip()

    Compute gene PIPs based on fine-mapping result and functional annotations.

    extract_gene_level_result()

    Extract gene-level result from SNP-level gene mapping result

    find_nearest_genes()

    Find the nearest genes for top SNPs in each locus.

    gene_by_distance()

    Find all genes (promoters) within 1MB genes and assign weights based on distance

    gene_cs()

    Get credible gene sets from SNP level gene mapping table

    gene_manhattan_plot()

    Make gene manhattan plot

    gene_view_summary()

    Gene view summary table

    make_genomic_annots()

    Make genomic annotations from a GTF file

    merge_bigsnp_gwas()

    merge_bigsnp_gwas

    merge_susie_sumstats()

    merges SuSiE results with original summary statistics data frame

    partition_pip_regions()

    Partition PIPs into functional annotation regions

    prepare_susie_data()

    Prepare SuSiE data

    prepare_torus_input_files()

    Prepare Torus input files

    process_ABC()

    Process ABC scores and save as a GRanges object

    process_finemapping_sumstat()

    Process fine mapping summary statistics data

    process_narrowpeaks()

    Load ENCODE narrow peak data and convert to a GRanges object

    process_pcHiC()

    Process pcHiC data and save as a GRanges object

    run_finemapping()

    Run finemapping

    run_gwas_cleaner()

    Clean GWAS summary statistics and adds metadata

    run_susie()

    run SUSIE

    run_torus()

    Run enrichment analysis and compute SNP-level priors using Torus

    snp_view_summary()

    SNP view summary table

    structure_plot()

    structure plot

    sum_pip_regions()

    Sum PIPs for genomic regions
